channel.title: Testscape's compiler and runeserver ~ help needed
channel.description:
Hi, I just started building a new server using Mod Taharoks' Ultimate Server Guide. I've done everything up to Chapter 2. Before I start chapter 2 on where to put npc's and so on, I need to login to Testscape. I open up my Testscape folder and open Runeserver. It gives me:
[b]Starting Testscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/b]
It stays like that ... I left it for 10 minutes and it stayed like that. So I double click Compile and it gives me this:
[b]c - compile your server r - To run your server e - To exit your server jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive colour - Change the text and backgroundcolours of the compiler reset - Resets your compiler logs
Option:[/b]
So I hit [b]r[/b] and it says:
[b]Starting Testscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/b]
And it stays the same forever, the same as the compiler does.
Help please :D

item.title: Testscape's compiler and runeserver ~ help needed
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Is this seriously so complicated to understand? When you double click runserver then that port thing pops up, you leave it just like that, don’t close it. Then you open the Moparscape client (www.moparisthebest.com for the webclient) and then you put in a name and a password and leave the “Server IP” spot BLANK.
Legendz, what the FUCK is going on with all that spam? This is Server Development/Help section, not Spam/Kill section.

Read full topic

thats fine, you use 0.0.0.0 in the ip field, and log in :l

item.title: Testscape's compiler and runeserver ~ help needed
item.dc:creator: @Torez1 Torez1
item.description:
@Torez1 wrote:

Hi, I just started building a new server using Mod Taharoks’ Ultimate Server Guide. I’ve done everything up to Chapter 2. Before I start chapter 2 on where to put npc’s and so on, I need to login to Testscape. I open up my Testscape folder and open Runeserver. It gives me:

Starting Testscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

It stays like that … I left it for 10 minutes and it stayed like that. So I double click Compile and it gives me this:

[b]c - compile your server
r - To run your server
e - To exit your server
jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive
colour - Change the text and backgroundcolours of the compiler
reset - Resets your compiler logs

Option:[/b]

So I hit r and it says:

Starting Testscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

And it stays the same forever, the same as the compiler does.

Help please

Read full topic
